textTemplates.name: orderApprovalMessage
orderApprovalMessageDM
orderInApprovalChatterPost
textTemplates.text: The Sample Order Item has been submitted for Approval.

textTemplates.name: OrderItemRejectionMessage
textTemplates.text:
Dear @[{!Get_OLI_1.Order.OwnerId}], Kindly be informed that the status of Sample Order Item {!Get_OLI_1.OrderItemNumber} has been changed to the status {!Get_OLI_1.Sample_Item_Approval_Status__c}.
Best regards, Your CRM Support Team

textTemplates.name: OrderItemRejectionMessageDM
textTemplates.text:
Dear @[{!Get_Distributor_User_Rejected.Id}], Kindly be informed that the status of Sample Order Item {!Get_OLI_1.OrderItemNumber} has been changed to the status {!Get_OLI_1.Sample_Item_Approval_Status__c}.
Best regards, Your CRM Support Team

textTemplates.name: orderRejectionMessage
textTemplates.text:
Dear @[{!Get_Order_1.OwnerId}], Kindly be informed that the status of Sample Order {!Get_Order_1.OrderNumber} has been changed to the status {!Get_Order_1.Status}.
Best regards, Your CRM Support Team

textTemplates.name: orderRejectionMessageDM
textTemplates.text:
Dear @[{!Get_Distributor_User_Rejected.Id}], Kindly be informed that the status of Sample Order {!Get_Order_1.OrderNumber} has been changed to the status {!Get_Order_1.Status}.
Best regards, Your CRM Support Team
